sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app class="blue">
    <v-card
    class="mx-auto"
    color="light secondary"
    width="200px"
    >
      <v-card
      class="d-flex flex-row mb-6"
      :color="$vuetify.theme.dark ? 'grey darken-3' : 'grey lighten-4'"
      flat
      tile
    >
      <v-card
        v-for="n in 3"
        :key="n"
        class="pa-2"
        outlined
        tile
      >
        Flex item {{ n }}
      </v-card>
    </v-card>
    </v-card>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
export default {
   data(){
       return{
        username:'',
        password:'',
        
       }
    },
    methods:{
        login(){
        this.$http.get('http://localhost:3000/login',{
            params:{
                "username":this.username,
                "password":this.password
            }      
        }).then(res => {
          if(res.data.status == 204){
            console.log("token:"+res.data.token,"userInfo:"+res.data.user)
            window.localStorage.setItem("currenttoken",res.data.token);
          }
        })
        .catch(err => {
          console.log(err.data.message)
        })
        }
    }
}
</script>
<style scoped>
  nav{
     overflow-y: hidden
  }
</style>
